description.value:
You magically broadcast grim news onto nearby devices, holo projectors, screens, and other displays (including comm units on armor). Creatures in the area who can see one or more displays must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Fascinated] by the display.

Failure The creature is fascinated by the display and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} (even if the fascination ends).

Critical Failure The creature is fascinated by the display, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3}, and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 1} (even if the fascination ends).
